```{r}
#Libraries
library(tidyverse)

#Parameters
demographic_file <- "~/Desktop/ELS/income_TBM/data/demographics_table1_201803.sav"
```

```{r}
demo <-
  haven::read_sav(demographic_file) %>% 
  filter(I2N != "NA") %>% 
  mutate(I2N = as.numeric(I2N)) %>% 
  rename(ELS_ID = Sub)
```

```{r}
demo %>% 
  count(Male)
```

```{r}
demo %>% 
  group_by(Male) %>% 
  summarise_all(
    funs(mean, sd)
  )
```

```{r}
demo_male <-
  demo %>% 
  filter(Male == 1)

range(demo_male$Age)
range(demo_male$Tanner)
range(demo_male$TBV)
```

```{r}
demo_female <-
  demo %>% 
  filter(Male == 0)

range(demo_female$Age)
range(demo_female$Tanner)
range(demo_female$TBV)
range(demo_female$I2N)
```

```{r}
sex_t_test <- function(x) {
  t.test(x ~ demo$Male, var.equal = TRUE)
}

sex_t_test(demo$Age)
sex_t_test(demo$Tanner)
sex_t_test(demo$TBV)
sex_t_test(demo$I2N)
```

```{r}
demo <- 
  demo %>% 
  mutate(
    Race = as.character(Race),
    Race = dplyr::recode(
      Race,
      "1" = "Caucasian",
      "2" = "African American",
      "3" = "Hispanic",
      "4" = "Asian",
      "5" = "Biracial",
      "6" = "Other"
    )
  )

demo %>% 
  group_by(Male, Race) %>% 
  summarise(
    n = n()
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    percent = n / sum(n)
  ) %>% 
  arrange(Male, desc(percent))


demo <-
  demo %>% 
  mutate(
    white = as.factor(
      recode(
        Race,
        "Caucasian" = 1,
        .default = 0
      )
    )
  )

chisq.test(demo$white, demo$Male)

```

```{r}
demo <-
  demo %>% 
  mutate(
    income_factor = as.factor(
      if_else(
        as.numeric(Income) > median(as.numeric(Income)),
        1, 0
      )
    )
  )

chisq.test(demo$income_factor, demo$Male)
```

```{r}
demo %>% 
  count(I2N < 1) %>% 
  mutate(
    percent = n / sum(n)
  )
```
